name: Mailchimp Campaigns Plugin
description: Ingest data from Mailchimp Campaigns into PostHog

config.markdown:
**Mailchimp API key**: Mailchimp API key for your account, including the data center suffix, for example: `0123456789abcdef0123456789abcde-us6`.

**PostHog Project API key**: API key for the PostHog project where you want to send events. Accessible in-app under "Project Settings".

**PostHog Host Address**: Base URL for your PostHog instance, if self-hosted. Default value will be `https://app.posthog.com/` (Cloud).
